p.s: I know how fond you are of the globalisation.
I know that you support the free trade and free market it enables.
However, I feel the need to inform you of the dark side of globalisation.
I read an article about three norwegianNorwegian fashionbloggersfashion bloggers being sent to work in a KambodianCambodian cloth factory for a day.
They experienced the life of a seamstress and cambodiaCambodia and report that they couldn't believe how bad the working conditions are there.
Usually we only hear of the suffering and can't imagine it, but to experience it is something completely different.
They come to the conclusion that we are rich because they are poor.
But you shouldn't forget that these people are worth the same as us.
Don't forget this the next time you praise the effects of globalization.
I hope I made you realise that not everything is as perfect as it seems.
Please do tell me what you think.
